Name: HEXMAPMAKER
About the game: Hexmapmaker is an easy to use software for making nice looking hex maps. Features Hand-painted art Export maps as high-res JPG Save/load maps 29 hex types (92 in total with variations) Add labels Add borders, roads, rivers, and bridges
